body:
API Gateway still supporting weak ciphers: TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384 and TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, when/ how offen will API Gateway TLS security policy patch?

API gateway provides option to select TLS version, however, you cannot select TLS ciphers.
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/apigateway-custom-domain-tls-version.html
AES256-GCM-SHA384 and AES128-GCM-SHA256	are considered strong.
https://ciphersuite.info/cs/TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256/
https://ciphersuite.info/cs/TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384/

But these two also AES256-GCM-SHA384 and AES128-GCM-SHA256, it is considered as weak
https://ciphersuite.info/cs/TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384/
https://ciphersuite.info/cs/TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256/
